tweet_text: @SaidaMY2 It is crucial that wild cassava is adequately prepared and detoxified to safe levels before being ground into flour.
text_en: It is crucial that wild cassava is adequately prepared and detoxified to safe levels before being ground into flour.

tweet_text: @SaidaMY2 The risk for acute cassava-associated cyanide poisoning occurs when the boiling time is too short and the toxins are not destroyed. If the cassava has been ground to flour, this flour is often mixed briefly with cassava bread, similar to posho or ugali.
